scrape.title: The dinner
scrape.author: Mary Simses
scrape.text: This book was chilling and disturbing but I couldn't put it down. I liked the way the plot built, just simmering in the beginning and then coming to a full boil at the end (sorry, but I couldn't resist the food-related analogy). It's not a book I would ever read twice but I did find it entertaining in a creepy way.
